mapper.select: SELECT mCart.cart_num as cartNum, mCart.product_code as pCode, mCart.amount as pAmount, pInfo.product_name as pName, pInfo.product_price as pPrice FROM member_cart AS mCart INNER JOIN product_info AS pInfo ON mCart.product_code = pInfo.product_code LEFT JOIN order_info AS oInfo on mCart.cart_num = oInfo.cart_num WHERE member_num = #{memberNum} ORDER BY cartNum ASC;
